ThingDef.label: yoghurt
ThingDef.description:
A creamy, tangy dairy product made by fermenting milk, often enjoyed on its own or used in cooking and baking.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 1 yoghurt requires 0.25 nutrition from each milk and fruit, with an average total value of 15, and sells for 30, giving a <color=#33CC33>50%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 450 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.07</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.2 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>150</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.31</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).
